argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_relogmul | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( log ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( log ` A ) + ( log ` B ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( log ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( log ` A ) + ( log ` B ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( ( log ` ( A x. B ) ) / ( log ` C ) ) = ( ( ( log ` A ) + ( log ` B ) ) / ( log ` C ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_relogcl | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_recnd | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( log ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_relogcl | |- ( B e. RR+ -> ( log ` B ) e. RR ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_recnd | |- ( B e. RR+ -> ( log ` B ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( log ` B ) e. CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_relogcl | |- ( C e. RR+ -> ( log ` C ) e. RR ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_recnd | |- ( C e. RR+ -> ( log ` C ) e. CC ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) -> ( log ` C ) e. CC ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( log ` C ) e. CC ) |
| 14 |  | #P_logne0 | |- ( ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) -> ( log ` C ) =/= 0 ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( log ` C ) =/= 0 ) |
| 16 | 6, 9, 13, 15 | #P_divdird | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( ( ( log ` A ) + ( log ` B ) ) / ( log ` C ) ) = ( ( ( log ` A ) / ( log ` C ) ) + ( ( log ` B ) / ( log ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 3, 16 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( ( log ` ( A x. B ) ) / ( log ` C ) ) = ( ( ( log ` A ) / ( log ` C ) ) + ( ( log ` B ) / ( log ` C ) ) ) ) |
